scripts.build:ipfs:mainnet: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph build --ipfs https://ipfs.network.thegraph.com
scripts.deploy-mainnet: yarn && yarn prepare:mainnet && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-activity --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-arbitrum: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-activity-arbitrum --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-goerli: yarn && yarn prepare:goerli && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-network-activity-testnet --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-arbitrum-goerli: yarn && yarn prepare:arbitrum-goerli && graph deploy graphprotocol/graph-activity-arbitrum-goerli --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-testing: yarn && yarn prepare:sepolia && graph deploy juanmardefago/graph-activity-sepolia --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.prepare:mainnet: yarn prep:addresses:mainnet && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:arbitrum: yarn prep:addresses:arbitrum && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:goerli: yarn prep:addresses:goerli && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-goerli: yarn prep:addresses:arbitrum-goerli && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:sepolia: yarn prep:addresses:sepolia && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
scripts.prepare:arbitrum-sepolia: yarn prep:addresses:arbitrum-sepolia && mustache ./config/generatedAddresses.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && graph codegen --output-dir src/types/
